subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Nwankwo Kanu scored in the first half for Portsmouth to beat Cardiff, 1-0, and win the F.A. Cup final for the first time since 1939. Kanu took advantage of a fumble by Cardiff goalkeeper Peter Enckelman in the 37th minute to give the team manager Harry Redknapp his first major trophy in 25 years of coaching.
